comment: If you can, please take Professor Lee! He's so sweet, caring, and is always willing to help you. Only met once a week, but his classes were super hands-on and interactive. Attendance isn't really mandatory, but attending lectures is beneficial to completing the weekly activity write-ups and labs.

Professor Lee is such a kind man who clearly loves teaching! Our classes were always very interactive and engaging, and the online components were not too bad at all. The labs were a bit time consuming, but we were always given plenty of time to complete them. I would definitely recommend taking him!!

Such a sweet man! Meet once a week and have a lab module due once a week. It is really easy and can easily be done in two days. We are currently working on a final project that is kind of set up how science fairs work.I would take him again! Try not to miss class because in order to do the week's assignment, you have to attend the class.

Professor Lee was super sweet and he really enjoys teaching. His class was hybrid so met once a week and work was due a week after we met. The workload consisted of a softchalk lesson, a lab, and a quiz- super easy and chill nothing too hectic. There is one group project but again super easy. Recommend this class for an easy grade!
Professor Lee cares about students succeeding. You have a week to complete a module which is most of the time a quiz, a lab, and a softchalk lesson.

Dr. Lee was amazing and I highly recommend taking him. He is extremely understanding and is easy to reach. He is very lenient about giving extensions on projects. Each week you have a quiz module and lab. The lab can be time consuming with it sometimes being 8 pages. Other then that the class is not terrible. Tests and quizzes are not lockdown.

A quiz, lab, and module assignment due every week. Very manageable. 
He is super understanding and flexible. Very helpful and quick to respond via email.
I would definitely take him. I took him online and still feel like I learned a lot.

He was very kind & wants to see student's succeed. I learned the most in this course this semester and found it to be easy to keep up with. He is very understanding & will provide extensions upon request. I found this course to be easy to understand. Quick to reply to emails and provides lots of explanation to any questions. Highly recommend!
Just do the work and you'll get a good grade. 3 assignments a week that would take me like an hour and a half but overall super easy content and class.

I would take this professor again. He is very understanding and will let you turn anything late in without taking points. There is also a group project which is really easy and you can work on your own if you would like to. He is easy to talk to outside of class.
This professor is so nice and works with his students to succeed. There is a group project, but you can work individually on it if your group doesn't or is unable to work together!

OMG take professor Soon Lee!! Beyond understanding and gives super easily understandable assignments, flexible with due dates & extremely understanding. Labs/modules can be time consuming but gives you more than enough time to complete them if you plan correctly. 100% would recommend anyone take
Gave me the opportunity to get my high B up to an A and was easy to work with and very helpful through the semester!
Lee is such a good professor, there was never a time where the material or his instructions were unclear. The assignments were the same every week.

Dr. Lee was a great professor. He truly cares about his students and is very lenient if you have a valid excuse. His lecture is long, so make sure to be filling out the AW while he teaches. This is a very manageable class, (1 quiz and one lecture write up a week). Tests are open note. If you attend class and turn your work in you will get an A.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Dr. Lee was very willing to go above and beyond for his students. We were always doing interesting activities in this class. I love the activities and I think the different experiments we did are very helpful to help the students we will teach in the future. Overall, I genuinely enjoyed this class.

Professor Lee is very passionate about what he teaches. He gives quizzes on d2L every Wednesday and assigns worksheets that are really long but are basically the lessons you do in class. The final is cumulative. Overall he is a good prof at times he can be hard to understand but he gives clear instructions.

Professor Lee really strives to help everyone understand the content. He was very engaging in class and used fun demonstrations to give us hands on experiences to help us learn also to use in our future classrooms. Attendance is required but he's very flexible, understanding, and willing to help us to catch up on what we missed.
One of the best professors I have ever had. Professor Lee was a great teacher. Well organized, always responded very quickly and very understanding when extra time was needed for assignments.

ONLINE class. Quiz & Tests - can use your notes & book; project 4 parts (500 word essay, 800 word essay on last 2 parts), weekly -a module, a write up (they are long 5-9 pages), a quiz. There are 3 exams and a final. Work is not hard just some write ups are long and some repeated stuff.
Professor Lee is truly a wonderful, understanding, and caring professor. I really enjoyed his class and all the activities he had us do. It made the class really engaging and fun.

Professor Lee is a very nice person and a good teacher, but very hard to understand at times so sit in the front. Quizzes are simple and he reuses questions. Attendance was ABSOLUTELY mandatory, he drops your letter grade if you have unexcused absences!!!!! Don't miss a class! Lots of hands-on activities that are sometimes boring.

Very compassionate professor. Respects the fact that college students have lives outside of school. Quickly responds to emails and has a lot of resources for assistance with the course and is happy to offer help.

I took his class in person for the first week & he was SO BORING but super nice so I switched into his online class. I never used the textbook so I wouldn't buy it. there's a final project, 3 exams and a module, lab, and quiz due every week. its not that much but sometimes the labs can be time consuming, I've never gotten anything lower than a B

There was a lot of work, and sometimes he goes too fast and is a little hard to understand. He posts all the PowerPoints, and he will move due dates if the class seems to need it. He goes over most of the content in the homework/quizzes/tests pretty clearly, and he recycles the questions on each. As long as you're in class, it is an easy A.
Dr. Lee is a very caring professor. He always made sure we understood everything he was teaching. Show up to class, pay attention, and do the work and it's an easy A.

Dr. Lee is one of my favorite professors. He is so kind and he wants you to do well in his class. Even during the midst of a pandemic, he did an excellent job of making his class engaging with fun demonstrations. He gave 30 extra credit points for perfect attendance. His class is easy & prepares you well for teaching. Take his class if you can!!
